title: Ticket #6019: Support sending of credentials/tokens with a new python credd-binding
description:
Hopefully in time for 8.7 or early 8.7 CERN would like the ability to generate and send kerberos tokens to remote CredDs via the python api.

This would be a python variant on the new condor_submit code that does the SEC_CREDENTIAL_PRODUCER hooking and sending.

Speaking to Brian and TJ, it looks like the nicest way forward is a CredD python interface for reading and sending credentials.
remarks:
